allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "chcp 65001 && python -c ""import pandas as pd; print\(pd.read_excel\(r''C:\\Users\\User\\Desktop\\樂莫集團稅務制度\\樂莫集團.xlsx''\).to_string\(\)\)""")

Bash(powershell -Command "
$excel = New-Object -ComObject Excel.Application
$excel.Visible = $false
$workbook = $excel.Workbooks.Open\(''C:\\Users\\User\\Desktop\\總代理產品資料\\01_軟瓷\\信德成\(梅景欣\)\\02_報價單\\信德成软瓷台湾报价单20250806.xlsx''\)
$sheet = $workbook.Sheets.Item\(1\)
$usedRange = $sheet.UsedRange
$rows = $usedRange.Rows.Count
$cols = $usedRange.Columns.Count
Write-Host ""Rows: $rows, Cols: $cols""
for \($i = 1; $i -le [Math]::Min\($rows, 50\); $i++\) {
    $row = @\(\)
    for \($j = 1; $j -le [Math]::Min\($cols, 10\); $j++\) {
        $val = $sheet.Cells.Item\($i, $j\).Text
        $row += $val
    }
    Write-Host \($row -join '' | ''\)
}
$workbook.Close\($false\)
$excel.Quit\(\)
")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "chcp 65001 >nul && cd /d ""C:\\Users\\User\\Desktop\\總代理產品資料"" && python compare_excel.py 2>&1")
